dublinCore.title: 113 HR 1264 IH: District of Columbia Medicaid Reimbursement Act of 2013
dublinCore.rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to increase the Federal medical assistance percentage for the District of Columbia under the Medicaid Program to 75 percent.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the District of Columbia Medicaid Reimbursement Act of 2013 .

section.header: Increasing the Medicaid Federal medical assistance percentage for the District of Columbia to 75 percent

subsection.text: The amendment made by subsection (a) shall apply to calendar quarters beginning on or after October 1, 2013.
